mulan.classifier.neural.model

Class ActivationTANH

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.neural.model.ActivationFunction
      • mulan.classifier.neural.model.ActivationTANH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ActivationTANH
extends ActivationFunction
    Implements the hyperbolic tangent activation function. The function output values are from interval <-1,1>.
    Version:
    2012.02.27
    Author:
    Jozef Vilcek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
